short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically tells twitter you are not interested in Twitter topics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No More Twitter Topics runs in the background when you are on Twitter's website. It searches for suggested topics and marks them as not interested, and an option in the extension allows it to make them completely vanish as if there was nothing ever suggested. This option is turned on by default.
